module.name: component_feature
module.keywords: module, component feature, part feature, component terminal, swap

abstract.p: the representation of component features and the their relationships in a physical design view. This is a fundamental enabling model for further specialization in ISO 10303. This application model supports specialization of component features as terminals enabling application of connectivity properties and requirements and supports assignment of the relationship between a component feature its assignment to a part feature in the physical usage view. This is an application of intellectual property control and management for the design organization as it allows the design organization to maintain one master copy from which published models or catalog data may be derived.
abstract.li: the definition of features of components in the assembly of a design view;
the relationship between component features of various kinds such as make from;
the assignment of component features to part features in a usage view;
the definition of component terminals and information if they can be exchanged with other terminals termincals, called swapping.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of component features and the their relationships in a physical design view. This is a fundamental enabling model for further specialization in ISO 10303. This application model supports specialization of component features as terminals enabling application of connectivity properties and requirements and supports assignment of the relationship between a component feature its assignment to a part feature in the physical usage view.

This is an application of intellectual property control and management for the design organization as it allows the design organization to maintain one master copy from which published models or catalog data may be derived.

inscope.li: the definition of features of components in the assembly of a design view;
the relationship between component features of various kinds such as make from;
the assignment of component features to part features in a usage view;
the definition of component terminals and information if they can be exchanged with other terminals termincals, called swapping;
items within the scope of application module Assembly component, ISO/TS 10303-1802;
items within the scope of application module Assembly shape, ISO/TS 10303-1808.

aa.refpath: component_feature <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'instantiated feature'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect {shape_aspect.product_definitional = .TRUE.}

component_feature_group_identification <= component_feature <= shape_aspect <- shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect {shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'component feature group identification element'} shape_aspect_relationship shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect -> shape_aspect shape_aspect => component_feature

component_feature_joint <= shape_aspect shape_aspect.of_shape -> product_definition_shape product_definition_shape <= property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition = product_definition

component_terminal <= component_feature <= shape_aspect shape_definition = shape_aspect characterized_definition = shape_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'global swappable'} representation_item => {descriptive_representation_item (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'false') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'true')} descriptive_representation_item

component_terminal <= component_feature <= shape_aspect shape_definition = shape_aspect characterized_definition = shape_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'local swappable'} representation_item => {descriptive_representation_item (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'false') (descriptive_representation_item.description = 'true')} descriptive_representation_item

component_terminal <= component_feature <= shape_aspect shape_definition = shape_aspect characterized_definition = shape_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation representation.items[i] -> {representation_item representation_item.name = 'swap code'} representation_item => descriptive_representation_item descriptive_representation_item.description

aa.refpath_extend: group <- group_assignment.assigned_group group_assignment => applied_group_assignment applied_group_assignment.items[i] -> groupable_item groupable_item *> cf_groupable_item cf_groupable_item = component_feature
